data.name: Pyro
data.description: A hotheaded fire-starter who excels at burning enemies in an area to inflict damage over time.

starItems.name: Pyro
starItems.description: A hotheaded fire-starter who excels at burning enemies in an area to inflict damage over time.

1.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target

3.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

4.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target.

5.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

6.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

7.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target.

1.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target.

4.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

5.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target.
5.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from each target
If Magneto is ally, clear all positive effects from each target

6.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from each target.

If Magneto is ally, clear all positive effects from each target.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from each target.

If Magneto is ally, clear all positive effects from each target.

1.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each target

2.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each target.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each target.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

4.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each target.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
If Magneto is an ally, each target has <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> prolonged by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each target.

If Magneto is ally, each target has <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> prolonged by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

6.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each target.

If Magneto is ally, each target has <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> prolonged by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to each target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If Magneto is ally, each target has <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> prolonged by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Extra Focus
When Pyro is attacked, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Focus.

When Pyro is attacked, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Extra Focus
If Magneto is ally, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Focus.

When Pyro is attacked, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

If Magneto is ally, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Extra Focus
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Focus.

When Pyro is attacked, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

If Magneto is ally, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Extra Focus
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Focus.

When Pyro is attacked, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.

If Magneto is ally, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

item.name: Gold
